overview: 20 years since one of the most dramatic days of the Former Yugoslavia conflicts, the destruction of the old bridge, also a symbol of the city; and after almost 10 years since its reconstruction by the international community, seven different characters live their lives in todayâ€™s Mostar, without meeting each other. What they have in common, however, are splinters of memory returning strongly from the past, and with which they have to deal.
title: Remnants
